title: Broadcasting, Entertainment and Arts Unions All-Party Parliamentary Group
purpose: The Group will be an active voice for all those working in the sector and for protecting the livelihoods of UK creatives. Supported by the BEAU - the Broadcasting, Entertainment and the Arts Unions: BECTU (Prospect); Equity, the National Union of Journalists (NUJ); the Musicians Union (MU) and the Writers Guild of Great Britain.
